coreAttributes.name: strapless bra
coreAttributes.description: This bra has no shoulder straps to help hold it in place, and as such relies on an extra-wide band for breast support. It is intended to be worn in combination with dresses that would leave a normal bra's shoulder straps on display.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(press)] the cups of the strapless bra to [npc.her] chest, before reaching around to [npc.her] back and fastening it in place.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(press)] the cups of the strapless bra to [npc2.namePos] chest, before reaching around to [npc2.her] back and fastening it in place.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(press)] the cups of the strapless bra to [npc2.namePos] chest, before reaching around to [npc2.her] back and fastening it in place.

displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(unfasten)] [npc2.namePos] strapless bra and [npc.verb(take)] it off.
